/usr/local/cuda-11.8/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/CudaRasterizer.dir/cuda_rasterizer/backward.cu.o CMakeFiles/CudaRasterizer.dir/cuda_rasterizer/forward.cu.o CMakeFiles/CudaRasterizer.dir/cuda_rasterizer/rasterizer_impl.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/CudaRasterizer.dir/cmake_device_link.o
